name: BACK TO SCHOOL AGAIN!
description:
A game about the dangers of Peer pressure! Will you make the right call!

"Jimmer has moved to a new town and School (Mountain Valley High). He is the new Kid in town and is looking forward to meeting all of his classmates and starting the academic semester."

Instructions: Using your mouse, Right Click Mouse to raise hand to throw and simultaneous Left click to throw the object at the teacher! Beware if he sees you with the raised hand he will warn you and if you persist you will be sent to the Principles Office!
